name: Beta Cells
description:
Eat cells. Become bigger. Be high on BETA CELLS WARNING: PHOTOSENSITIVITY/EPILEPSY SEIZURES
Sorry for this version, we had a blur issue but don't worry  it's already resolved!
We'll upload the new version as soon as possible.

This game is playable with mouse only:

  • Move your mouse to control
  • Left click to slow down
  • Left click to begin or restart

Eat cells that are smaller than you to be bigger and high.

Made for the StaySafeJame by:

Hugo Bombail Programmer

Thomas Chastagnol Sound Designer

Simon Giraud Artist
